data.actual_result: The button gets very small, moves to the right and the "X" symbol gets deleted.
data.expected_result: The "X" button should be bigger, moved to the left and have the "X" symbol in the button.
data.short_description: The "X" button gets small, moves to the right and the "X" dissapears (Android 7.0+)
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to Server Settings - Split your screen and make the Discord part of the screen the smallest as it can be -5Click Channels - Click the "+" button
